subject: [Radiance-general] how to 1) simulate reflected solar radiationand 2) longwave radiation from heated surface
body:
Hi David,

I can't think of anything off-hand that would suit your needs, but perhaps there are others on the list who will have suggestions.

Best of luck,
-Greg
